denyPrimitiveRoles.name: custom.iamPolicyDenyPrimativeRoles
denyPrimitiveRoles.description: Deny granting primative roles like roles/owner, roles/editor

orgAdminRoles.name: custom.iamPolicyDenyOrgAdminRoles
orgAdminRoles.description: Deny org level admin roles like roles/assuredworkloads.admin, roles/billing.admin, roles/cloudasset.owner, roles/iam.organizationRoleAdmin, roles/resourcemanager.folderIamAdmin, roles/resourcemanager.organizationAdmin, roles/resourcemanager.projectCreator, roles/resourcemanager.projectDeleter, roles/resourcemanager.tagAdmin, roles/orgpolicy.policyAdmin

denyBigQueryAdmin.name: custom.iamPolicyDenyBigQueryAdmin
denyBigQueryAdmin.description: Deny granting BigQuery admin roles like roles/bigquery.resourceAdmin, roles/bigquery.admin
